reviewText: Cliche after cliche after cliche in Hollywood films is addressed. To be honest, I'm floored to actually see this movie here at amazon! I'm happy though, cause I get to bash it! Nothing at all was original...*white girl is a "ghost" and helps Marques duck the doctor time after time "Duck. NOW!"*guys (Marques and Omarion) get tricked into going to another's out of the way cabin, thinking the sheriff is there just cause there's a police car there*Omarion picks up the phone and white powder comes out, that just so happens to knock him out (LMFAO!)*Marques LEAVES his friend and eventually falls down running from the killer*killer is actually a former doctor with a bad reputation of killing women *Y A W N**Marques' friends, including Omarion are locked up in cages and he *G U L P* FORGETS the keys*Marques GOES BACK only to see that the killer, who he stabbed in the back once and LEFT THE KNIFE WITH HIM, has left the building*Killer comes back and Marques gets knocked outI'll let you watch the rest of this pathetic mess. It WAS intriguing until too many of the trite occurrences pop out one after another.I watched this crappy movie on BET tonight BTW. It ended like an hour ago , Thank Goodness.Cover Art: D+Inside Art: N/AStory: FCharacters: C-Comic Relief: F-*Embarrassment It Brought: ALength: B-2.1 stars.Overall: D-Don't even buy this movie USED at 10 dollars, plus. Get it for 4 bucks or less unless you're a big fan then go ahead and blow the money. At least most of the terrible actors and actresses look good!

reviewText: Seems like I have reviewed this movie, but I'm being asked to review it.  It was rather silly, but it was full of suspense and mini chills.  I rate movies by how I enjoy them, not the oscar worthiness of them.  They have the second one out also which was a little more tense and a little more silly.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Somebody Help Me was  more realistic than a lot of the movies in this genre.Both Omarion and Marques do a pretty good job acting as does the rest of the cast,especially for it's low budget.It has some good gory kill scenes,a little bit of supernatural,I usually don't care for that in my slashers,but  for some reason it works in this film..It deals with REALITY as far as when the teens bring up the question (Will the white town people and sheriff believe us because we're Black) When wanting to report their friends missing and the fact that they think there's a killer on the loose.They unfortunately are staying in a cabin that is too close for comfort to a disgruntled psycho maniac plastic surgeon wannabe who takes his captives and locks them in small dog like cages and then performs plastic surgery on them.. WELL lets say he doesn't have a very good bedside manner.The Two main characters played by Omarion and Marques do what a person SHOULD do when confronting a maniac.. not what stereotypical characters do.I wont give anymore away..It's a good watch for Genre lovers especially for an urban slasher.
summary: Best in the lastest bunch of Urban Slashers

reviewText: i wasn't expecting anything from this at all.  i just wanted to watch something that had a little bit of suspense and scares in it.  it had a bit more than that as the deaths were a bit much other folks might want to be wary of those.  the story while nothing really special serves it's purpose.  I can see why "Somebody.." was a DVD release and might be best watched via rent first.  But check it out for yourself and then decide after that.  Nothing spectacular or anything, but better than a lot of crap i've seen recently...also leaves it open for a sequel.

reviewText: Do NOT spend $22 on this movie.  I got a second-hand copy for $5 and I wish I could return it.  I really seriously wanted to like this movie but it's like the writer went out of his/her way to make me hate it.  The charachters in this movie are some of the dumbest people ever, and you just hope that the killer would go ahead and find them, kill them, and put them out of MY misery.This movie is complete garbage PLEAAASSSEEE do not spend $22 on this.  The bad part is I'm actually watching the movie as I write this.  Couldn't wait.
summary: One of the Dumbest Movies I've Ever Seen

reviewText: A group of friend vacationing at a cabin in the woods for the weekend for one of their birthdays are menaced by an evil plastic surgeon.Feautering a bevy of characters, none of which I cared about, getting killed by one of the more lame serial killers of recent memory, this putrid horror film by the director who killed the House Party franchise, this putrid film isn't worth the time spent reviewing it.
Title: N/A

reviewText: BET took a huge leap with this movie! One late night, during the time of Halloween, I stumbbled upon this movie. I didn't get the name, because I ws so into this movie! It reminds me of saw, and the acting was great! The cast is well known and the plot is really good. I love that this movie has african american actors in it, which I myself have been waiting for a long time! We need to break out more into the horror genre and BET did just that! It's a great movie, very scary and you can trust me, I know my horror movies! BUY IT!
summary: Great mix to the horror cinema!
